pages.text: Earth charges are used to instantly mine earthy Blocks, such as dirt, grass, stone, ect. It can also be used in crafting to turn some things into dust and break some storage blocks down, such as a quartz block into four quartz. Firing one from a dispenser will fire a linear projectile that will apply the $(l:thermal:world/mobs/basalz)Sundered$(/l) effect on mobs hit and provide a strong knockback.
Legend has it that these were once powerful enough to break bedrock.
